packages/translator/test/fixtures/at-tags-dynamic/template.marko(4,17): Tag does not support arguments.
  2 |     <@list>
  3 |         <for|color| of=input.colors>
> 4 |             <if(x)>
    |                 ^
  5 |                 <@item style={ color }>foo</@item>
  6 |             </if>
  7 |             <else>
